alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 29 at 11:28PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY NIGHT... WHAT...High surfs of 8 to 10 feet WHERE...south and east shores WHEN...Through Thursday night IMPACTS...Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 1128 PO ASO LULU NOVEMA 29 2023 ...O LOO TUMAU FAUTUAGA MO GALU MAUALULUGA E OO I LE PO O LE ASO TOFI... MAFUAAGA...Galu maualuluga e 8 i le 10 futu NOFOAGA...Talafatai i saute ma sasa`e TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le po o le Aso Tofi FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Puipuiga/Tapenaga Faatino mo Fautuaga o Galu Maualuluga:Tagata uma o loo tafafao i le matafaga, auau, fa`apea le `au fa`ase`e galu, e tatau ona fa`autagiaina fautuaga uma e aumaia e tagata o loo puipuia le saogalemu ma ia faatinoina ma le faaeteete.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
